title: Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Introduction to Vertex AI Conversation
abstract:
# Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Introduction to Vertex AI Conversation
Vertex AI Conversation is a set of generative conversational features built on Dialogflow and [Vertex AI](/vertex-ai/docs) .
With these features, you can now use large language models (LLMs) to parse and comprehend content, generate agent responses, and control conversation flow. This can significantly reduce agent design time and improve agent quality.
For more information, see the Dialogflow [Vertex AI Conversation documentation](/dialogflow/cx/docs/concept/generative)
